caption.p: Populations of Chilo partellus, Busseola fusca, Sesamia calamistis and Spodoptera frugiperda and their associated parasitoids in two multi- pest species competitive systems. ( A) C. partellus + B. fusca (Cp + Bf) system; ( B) B. fusca + S. calamistis (Bf + Sc) system; ( C) S. frugiperda + C. partellus (Sf + Cp) system; ( D) C. partellus + S. calamistis (Cp + Sc) system; ( E) S. frugiperda + B. fusca (Sf + Bf) system; ( F) S. frugiperda + S. calamistis (Sf + Sc) system.
